content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

-- Create external table using SELECT statemanet
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL 
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone;
Go
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc_taxi_ldw.silver.taxi_zone
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

SELECT *
FROM silver.taxi_zone;
